code: import moment from'moment';export var getDateMoment=function getDateMoment(){var date=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:new Date();return moment([date.getFullYear(),date.getMonth(),date.getDate()]);};export var dateDiff=function dateDiff(date1,date2){var moment1=getDateMoment(date1);var moment2=getDateMoment(date2);return moment1.diff(moment2,'days');};export var getFirtMonthDate=function getFirtMonthDate(date){return moment(date).set('day',1).toDate();};export var getLastMonthDate=function getLastMonthDate(date){return moment(getFirtMonthDate(date)).add('month',1).add('day',-1).toDate();};
